rows.label: tlk70000052_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Adel-sama, Laura-sama! I often
hear rumors about you. I'm
glad to see you are well!

rows.label: tlk70000052_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Adel-sama... I was thinking...maybe
it's time that we should chronicle
your adventures? For posterity's sake?

rows.label: tlk70000052_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I could read them to my dear old
grandmother. She'd love to hear about
the impressive people I work for!

rows.label: tlk70000052_04_msg0004
rows.name:
But my memory's not up to much,
and I'm not really a gifted
writer either, truth be told.

rows.label: tlk70000052_04_msg0005
rows.name:
How can I keep a record, I wonder...
Ah...damn. I'm leaving soon, but I'm
not really getting anywhere with this.

rows.label: tlk70000052_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Ah, I've got it! Do you think you
could tell me some of your stories?

rows.label: tlk70000052_04_msg0007
rows.name:
Whenever you're at a loose
end! It'd be such a great
help if you could!
